sentences.sentence: Have a glass of egg - nog instead.
No. That's nog good either. But give me your number and I'll call you if somebody cancels.
sentences.translation: 不。也不行。不过请你把电话号码给我，如果友人取消约会，我就打电话通知你。

sentences.sentence: If you really want some of that egg nog or mulled wine, treat yourself to one glass and sip it slowly.
sentences.translation: 如果你真的想要一些蛋酒或者热红酒，只给自己一杯，并且慢慢地喝。
